hadiths.text: Abu Huraira reported Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) as saying:The wound caused (by falling) in the well, in the mine, and caused bv the animal has no requital for it; and there is one-fifth (for the government) in the buried treasure

chapter.ara-name: باب جَرْحُ الْعَجْمَاءِ وَالْمَعْدِنِ وَالْبِئْرِ جُبَارٌ
chapter.eng-name: There is no Diyah for injuries caused by animals or by falling into a mine or well
